controlRef.description: Get ref of spoiler toggle button
controlRef.description_zh: 获取 ref of spoiler 切换按钮

hideLabel *.description_zh: 用于关闭扰流板动作的标签

initialState.description: Initial spoiler state, true to wrap content in spoiler, false to show content without spoiler, opened state is updated on mount
initialState.description_zh: 初始剧透状态，true 将内容包含在剧透中，false 显示不带剧透的内容，打开状态在挂载时更新

maxHeight.description: Maximum height of the visible content, when this point is reached spoiler appears, 100 by default
maxHeight.description_zh: 可见内容的最大高度，当达到此点时出现剧透，默认为 100

onExpandedChange.description: Called when expanded state changes (when spoiler visibility is toggled by the user)
onExpandedChange.description_zh: 当展开状态更改时调用（当用户切换剧透可见性时）

showLabel *.description_zh: 打开扰流板动作的标签

transitionDuration.description: Spoiler reveal transition duration in ms, set 0 or null to turn off animation, 200 by default
transitionDuration.description_zh: 剧透显示过渡持续时间（毫秒），设置 0 或 null 关闭动画，默认为 200
